name: Punch me
body:
# Punch Me

**This is one of the [Hong Kong Code Camp 2012](http://camp.codeaholics.hk) projects**

## Idea Description

An image (I am expecting a face of politician) is displayed on a screen. When a user stands in front of the screen and "punch", the image is distorted.

Something like ...

After:
